title: The 70-Hour Work Week: A Cautionary Tale
image_desc: A dramatic image of a cityscape at night, symbolizing the pressure and intensity of modern work life.
narration: This is a story about a company that prioritized productivity over well-being, and the consequences that followed.  Let's explore the impact of a mandated 70-hour work week.

title: The Announcement
content:
CEO announces 70-hour work week.
Employees react with shock and disbelief.
image_desc: An image of a CEO confidently addressing a large group of employees, who look shocked and concerned.
narration: The CEO's announcement of a mandatory 70-hour work week sent shockwaves through the company.  Employees were stunned.  The initial reaction was one of disbelief and concern.

title: Employee Concerns
content:
Concerns about work-life balance.
Questions about health and well-being.
Fear of burnout and exhaustion.
image_desc: An image of employees whispering amongst themselves, looking worried and stressed.
narration: Employees voiced their concerns.  How could they possibly maintain a healthy work-life balance?  What about their physical and mental health?  The fear of burnout loomed large.

title: The CEO's Response
content: (No additional content for this slide type)
image_desc: A close-up shot of the CEO looking stern and unyielding, with a caption below reading: "Successful people prioritize work."
narration: The CEO's response was dismissive. He insisted that success required prioritizing work above all else, framing the 70-hour week as an opportunity, not a burden.  This only fueled the growing discontent.

title: The Consequences: Part 1
content:
**Impact on Employees**
Exhaustion and burnout.
Missed personal events.
Deteriorating mental and physical health.
**Company Morale**
Decreased productivity.
Increased absenteeism.
Growing resentment and distrust.
image_desc: An image split into two, one showing an exhausted employee working late, the other showing a tense team meeting.
narration: The consequences were immediate and devastating.  Employees suffered from exhaustion, missed important personal events, and experienced a decline in their physical and mental health.  Company morale plummeted, leading to decreased productivity, increased absenteeism, and a growing sense of resentment and distrust.

title: The Consequences: Part 2
content:
Mass resignations.
Negative media attention.
CEO's reflection on failure.
image_desc: An image showing a news report about mass resignations at the company, alongside an image of the CEO looking defeated.
narration: The situation escalated rapidly.  Mass resignations followed, bringing negative media attention and ultimately leading to the CEO's reflection on his leadership failures.  The 70-hour work week proved to be a disastrous decision.

title: Lessons Learned
content:
Prioritize employee well-being.
Foster a healthy work-life balance.
Encourage open communication and feedback.
image_desc: An image depicting a supportive and collaborative work environment, with happy and engaged employees.
narration: This story serves as a stark reminder of the importance of prioritizing employee well-being, fostering a healthy work-life balance, and creating an environment where open communication and feedback are encouraged.  The pursuit of productivity shouldn't come at the expense of employee health and happiness.
